name: Mephistopheles Tiefling
description: Tieflings bound to Mephistopheles, the archdevil of Cania, are masters of arcane magic.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Legacy of Cania
traits.description: You know the Mage Hand cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Burning Hands once as a 2nd-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast Flame Blade once. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait.
